thread.title: Most Americans still find new music on the radio - KXVO
thread.title_full: Most Americans still find new music on the radio - KXVO - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KXVO
title: Most Americans still find new music on the radio - KXVO
text:
Neilsen reports that the majority of music listeners still find new bands through the airwaves, and are extremely unlikely to pay for streaming music in the near future. Neilsen reports that the majority of music listeners still find new bands through the airwaves, and are extremely unlikely to pay for streaming music in the near future.
 KXVO.
